forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
